scripts.cov: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web coverage run manage.py test
scripts.cov_rep: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web coverage report
scripts.lint: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pylint authorization frontend news news_project
scripts.fixture: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web python ./project/manage.py loaddata news
scripts.flush: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web python ./project/manage.py flush --no-input
